name: Business Tycoon Billionaire (itch)
description:
Welcome to the world of Business Tycoon Billionaire, become an Billionaire by managing your businesses.
Expand your empire and give your economy a boost with specialized managers that will automate the workflow of your businesses!
Upgrade your businesses and your income.

FEATURES
★ Manage your own businesses and automate the workflow to get more money
★ Get money, even when you are offline from Steam
★ Invest your money and boost your income
★ Hire managers
★ Upgrade businesses
★ Create a monopoly by buying out all sorts of businesses and protect your investments
★ Unlock 10 awesome businesses
